name: Space Birthday Party
description:
Its your sisters birthday! in space! get supplies for the party in this simple platformer

Controls: 

WASD to move

Space to jump (you have a double jump)

Credits:

Created by Amish Alvi (twinkietalks)

Modifications: 

added custom sprites for a mother character, a bed, translucent tiles for windows

added an ontrigger dialogue system

added custom goals

added a custom background
